TestCase.name: testPushExpressionsOnSemiJoin_Exists
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM l WHERE EXISTS (SELECT d FROM r WHERE CAST(b AS INTEGER) = d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($3, $4)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], b0=[CAST($1):INTEGER]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, l, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, r, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testPushExpressionsOnSemiJoin_In
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM l WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM r WHERE b + 1 = e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(d=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(+($cor0.b, 1), $1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, r, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, l, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), =($3, $5))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $f3=[+($1, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, l, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, r, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testPushExpressionsOnSemiJoin_NotIn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM l WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM r WHERE b + 1 = e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[NOT(IN($0, { LogicalProject(d=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(+($cor0.b, 1), $1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, r, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]]) }))], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, l, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(=($0, $4), IS NULL($0), IS NULL($4)), =($3, $5))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $f3=[+($1, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, l, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, r, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testPushExpressionsOnSemiJoin_NotExists
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM l WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT d FROM r WHERE CAST(b AS INTEGER) = d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($3, $4)], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], b0=[CAST($1):INTEGER]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, l, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, r, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])
